name: CocktailRecipes
0: ”Alexa, ask cocktail expert to teach me how to make a moscow mule”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cocktail expert
des: Do you ever find your self looking for new cocktails to make at home? Well this skill give you Alexa access to instructions for making your favorite cocktails, as well as any you might want to try. This will make it simpler to access instruction need to make your cocktail perfect. To use this skill you will need to ask the bartender to make the cocktail you have in mind. For example 'Alexa, ask the best bartender in town to make a mojito'.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
